game_description: Whirligig is a VR media player for the playback and viewing of video and images. It support a wide range of projection types, video support and visual options to make watching your media as enjoyable as possible. Main Features A wide range of projection types including fisheye 90 to 360 degrees, equirectangular, cinema, and custom formats for more unusual projection types including cubemaps, camera specific projection and many more. All viewable in stereo over under and side by side. 3 render paths to choose from to offer the widest possible video support. A selection of backgrounds to choose. Give your media an outer glow. Subtitle support with accompanying srt files or internal using the Video Lan video path. 16 Save/Load slots to save your position in files and bookmark them for later. Save media settings into presets to easily switch between projection types. Bookmark your media so you can easily return to them later.
review_1: Using the pc version to stream via Virtual desktop to quest 2 since years. Whirligig is the best media player around and I have tested several players. But the Quest version is lacking support for external devices, network access, upnp, smb etc. Please add this functionality. Then I will give 5 stars. Many thanks..
review_2: Need to connect NAS via SMB but can't find if it's even possible
review_4: Unfortunately it crashes immediately on Quest 1
review_5: I have tried the other major VR video apps and Whirligig is certainly one of the best out there. The developer is extremely responsive and goes through many lengths to look at and provide potential solutions for issues. I have used the Rift version and the Quest version is pretty solid. There are features Phil is working on that I am looking forward to and I will be a continued customer.
